item.title: 【Interviews / TV shows / Others】SDTV - (re-up) 2000 MTV Video Music Awards Opening Act (Pre Show) September 7, 2000
item.description:
Event: 2000 MTV Video Music Awards Opening Act (Pre Show)
Date: September 7, 2000
Location: Radio City Music Hall, New York City, New York
Source: VHS (Includes Original Commercials)

Pre Show Performer
Papa Roach - "Last Resort" and "Broken Home"

Includes Interviews With
Destiny's Child
NSYNC
Sisqo
Mandy Moore
Britney Spears
Nelly
Blink-182
Christina Aguilera
Eve
Pink
Aaliyah

Plus Many More!

Notes
Complete as originally aired Thursday September 7, 2000
